title: Brand New Water View,1Bed 1Bath Spacious Living Room with Full Kitchen
neighborhood: hercules, pinole, san pablo, el sob
posting_body: Looking to rent this beautiful brand new detached 1 bedroom unit with water view in Hercules CA, recently built on the 2nd floor with brand new kitchen appliances, bathroom, double-pane windows.
This is located near the bay water and trail for walking and biking.
1 Mile to Safeway Supermarket & Gas Station.
Rent including Utilities and PG&E: $2,500/month with first, last and deposit.
Minimum lease term: 6-12 months or more.
